
# GUIDE:

  
**Contents:**

-   Introduction
-   Simple menu creation
-   Advanced menu creation
-   Whats to come

  
**Introduction:**  
EMenus makes creation of menus much simpler. To get started install the package with

    pip install EMenus

After the installation is done, you can import it into your python project with

    import EMenus

  
  
  

# Creating a simple menu:

The simplest form of a menu currently supported is a One Question and Three Choices type, here is an example:

    choices = ["1","2","3"]
    EMenus.mcreate("Inventory","Equip?",choices)

The result:  

![](data:image/png;base64,)

An item equip type menu.

  
  

# Creating an advanced menu:

This package also supports custom menu creation as well. Currently the only command that functions for custom menu creation is:

    EMenus.UserInput.uinput(variablename)

This can be used to get input data without having to write a validator.
